trans-unit.source: If the button is a separator, that is, if fsStyle is set to $BTNS_SEP, iBitmap determines the width of the separator, in pixels

trans-unit.source: Command identifier associated with the button. This identifier is used in a WM_COMMAND message when the button is chosen
